articles.author: Lex Harvey
articles.title: European nations to send troops to Greenland as US annexation threats escalate - CNN
articles.description: Several NATO countries are deploying small numbers of military personnel to Greenland to participate in joint exercises with Denmark as US President Donald Trump ramps up his threats to forcibly annex the Arctic island.

articles.author: Grant Tremblay
articles.title: From a new flagship space telescope to lunar exploration, global cooperation – and competition – will make 2026 an exciting year for space - The Conversation
articles.description: The US, China, India, Europe and Japan all have exciting missions on the horizon in 2026. Many of them are collaborative feats.
